## Description
Implement the core features of the Monkey Console Application for managing monkey species data and displaying information in an interactive console interface.

## Requirements
- [ ] **List Monkeys**: Display a complete list of all available monkey species with basic information
- [ ] **Get Monkey Details**: Retrieve and display detailed information about a specific monkey species
- [ ] **Pick a Random Monkey**: Implement functionality to select and display a random monkey from the collection
- [ ] **Include ASCII Art**: Add ASCII art representations for monkey species display in the console UI

## Acceptance Criteria
- All features are functional in the console application
- Console UI is user-friendly and intuitive
- Code follows the project's C# coding standards (PascalCase for classes/methods, camelCase for variables)
- Code includes XML documentation comments
- All features use async/await where applicable
- Nullable reference types are enabled
- File-scoped namespaces are used

## Related Architecture
This task involves working with:
- Console UI
- MonkeyHelper static service
- Monkey model class
